title: hello
body:
I did mistake selling skin from re-roll into random skin.
I got program leblanc skin. 
could you cancle selling date? 
plaese...I like leblanc...

replies.body: I'd recommend you submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and see if there's anything they can do to help, though they may not be able to, either due to limitations with what they can change or how the loot system works, or perhaps due to Riot's policy on this kind of issue.
